flawed_nl_solution:
Stan needs to write 200 words because 5 x 400 = <<5*400=200>>200
This will take him 4 minutes because 200 / 50 = <<200/50=4>>4
He drinks 0.25 an ounce per minute because 15 / 60 = 0.25
He will drink 1 ounces of water while writing the paper because 4 x (0.25) = <<4*0.25=1>>1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 200. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
